DataElement.preferredDefinition: An indication whether or not the patient consented to specimen collection and use.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Did the patient agree to have
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient agree to have their specimen collected (prior to treatment and post-progression and/or post-mortem) and agrees to have the specimen samples and related health information used for the laboratory studies described in the protocol?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient agree to have their specimen(s) collected at timepoints specified in the protocol and any said specimen samples and related health information used for the protocol prescribed laboratory studies?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient agreed to provide archival tumor material (most recent archival tumor tissue immediately prior to enrollment is strongly preferred) for research and agrees to undergo research tumor biopsy before treatment if lesions are easily accessible (judged by the treating physician)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does participant withdraw consent for use of banked specimens?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does participant withdraw consent for use of research data and images?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 5
ReferenceDocuments.description: I agree that my samples and related health information may be used for the laboratory study.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 6
ReferenceDocuments.description: I agree that my samples and related health information may be used for the laboratory study described in the study consent.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 7
ReferenceDocuments.description: I agree that my study doctor, or someone on the study team, may contact me or my doctor to see if I wish to learn about results from these studies.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 8
ReferenceDocuments.description: I agree that my samples and related health information may be used for the laboratory studies described in the study consent.

DataElement.changeDescription: 2/7/20 tmt released/MM. Created for Seed Study; tmt
